divs: sighting detailsas i was sitting in my car after pumping gas at shell station less than a mile from my home, i noticed a bright white fixed light hovering just below the ridge-line. it was low enough that at 1st glance, i thought maybe it was just a light from a home or building on the ridge. i then noticed the light wasn't fixed to part of any structure, & that it was moving very slowly towards my location; i sat in my car at the gas pump to watch the light as it sort of drifted slowly, & effortlessly closer to my position. it moved closer & closer very lazily, to reveal 2 flashing lights (slightly varying in color, sort of off-white & amber; [note] they were not apparent upon initially seeing the aircraft) on it's right side. i couldn't make out a shape at that time, & i assumed that it was just a helicopter, as the altitude seemed too low for an airplane. i rolled down my windows (from cracked to fully open) to see if i could hear any engine noise, there was absolutely no sound; the gas station wasn't busy, so there was no obstruction in my ability to hear it if there were. as i said before, the craft was at very low altitude. as the craft flew (almost) directly over head, it's shape & characteristics became obvious; it was distinctively triangular, & the wing span was at-least double the size of any airplane i've ever seen. there was a singular bright fixed lights on it's nose, a bright amber light in the dead center, 2 flashing lights at the tip of each wing (or where the wings should've been). the craft drifted listlessly, moving as if it were underwater, & as i was observing, it sort of banked slightly to reveal it's underside, & effortlessly flew turned vertically w\a wing pointed towards the sky, & a wing pointed to the ground. it maintained this maneuver for only a short period of time, however it was able to perform it w\an ease that seemed highly unusual. each of these lights that formed this triangular shape were very vivid & not characteristic of any standard aircraft i'm familiar w\. i felt the urge to get out of the car & alert it to the attention the few people around outside, however no1 was paying any attention, nor did the seem like they'd be interested, & my shyness\fear of embarrassment wouldn't allow me to speak up to point it out. i noticed it was flying towards an area i was familiar w\, so i decided to follow it. i lost sight of it as i was making a u-turn in the parking lot to head in it's direction, & as tried to relocate the object, it had completely disappeared. i don't know if i just lost track of it, or what, but the direction it was moving, along w\the apparent speed & size, plus the fact it only took 20 seconds or so to turn around & pull out of the parking lot, i felt like i should've been able to relocate it w\ease, but it was nowhere to be found. it was disappointing to lose track, however it was exhilarating to be eyewitness to such a marvel of aeronautics, whether it be 1 of ours, or from another world all-together. the area my small town occupies seems to be a magnet for ufo activity, as i see strange lights\craft fairly often...
